{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|''rev-prod-of-extents''}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|notes={{mark expos}}|
constexpr std::size_t /*rev-prod-of-extents*/( rank_type i ) const noexcept;
}}

Returns the product of the sizes of extents with index greater than {{c|i}}. The behavior is undefined if {{c|i &lt; rank()}} is {{c/core|false}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|an index above which the sizes of corresponding extents will be multiplied together}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
If {{c|i + 1 &lt; rank()}} is {{c/core|true}}, return the product of {{box|{{rlpt|extent}}{{c/core|(k)}}}} for all {{tt|k}} in range {{range plain|i + 1|rank()}}, otherwise {{c|1}}.
